backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing chat sessions, user profiles, and authorization with logic for action messages and Puro’s auto-responses.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON placeholder.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files used as reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component fetching caller profile and showing either profile setup or chat page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Text input and send button handling Enter-to-send and action message detection.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatTranscr: Renders chat messages or an empty-state prompt inviting the user to start.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Displays individual messages with styling for sender and action type.
Avatar component rendering Puro’s image in multiple sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/ChatLayou: Page layout with header, footer, and Puro branding.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for entering and saving a new user’s display name before chatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestSessionId.ts: Provides a memoized guest session ID using local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling auth-client setup, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile and chat operations using actor and session identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, wrapping it in query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat page fetching history, sending messages, handling errors, and managing scroll behavior.
frontend/src/utils/guestSession.ts: Utilities for creating, retrieving, and clearing guest session IDs using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for an in-universe Puro roleplay chat app, including roleplay rules, features, UI expectations, and asset handling. Lists existing features, architectural notes, and metadata for build planning.
